item.title: Dubai Chamber partners with Souq.com
item.description: The Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry and Souq.com, the leading online retail and marketplace platform in the Middle East, have partnered to boost Chamber membersâ€™ participation in regional e-commerce. The agreement grants Dubai Chamber members exclusive benefits from Souq.com, including complimentary access to its Fulfilled by SOUQ services for three months and specialized onboarding training. These benefits also encompass enhanced search visibility, customer support, and promotional opportunities. In turn, Souq.
